ss.qwirkle.common

Class BoardChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.qwirkle.common.BoardChecker

  • public abstract class BoardChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Auxiliary class for checking the validity of moves on the board.
    Author:
    Karanum

      • canPlaceTile

        public static boolean canPlaceTile(Board board,
                   Tile tile,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   boolean checkAttached)
        Returns whether a tile can be placed on the board.
        Parameters:
        board - The board instance to place the tile on
        tile - The tile to the placed
        x - The x coordinate of the tile
        y - The y coordinate of the tile
        checkAttached - Whether to check if the tile is attached to any other tiles

      • canPlaceTile

        public static boolean canPlaceTile(Board board,
                   Tile tile,
                   int x,
                   int y)
        Returns whether a tile can be placed on the board. Checks if it is connected.
        Parameters:
        board - The board instance to place the tile on
        tile - The tile to the placed
        x - The x coordinate of the tile
        y - The y coordinate of the tile

      • isCoordAttached

        public static boolean isCoordAttached(Board board,
                      int x,
                      int y)
        Returns whether the position on the board has any tiles next to it.
        Parameters:
        board - The board instance to check this on
        x - The x coordinate
        y - The y coordinate

      • isMoveConnecting

        public static boolean isMoveConnecting(Board board,
                       Move move)
        Returns whether a move is connected. (That is, no empty tiles in between)
        Parameters:
        board - The board instance to check this on
        move - The move to be checked

        Returns whether a tile can join patterns with the tiles around it.
        Parameters:

        tile - The tile to be checked
        x - The x coordinate of the tile
        y - The y coordinate of the tile
